title: Hospital Information System (SIMRS)
description: Hospital Information System (SIMRS) is an application used to manage patient, doctor, cemical drug and other data in hospitals.

title: Employee Management System
description: The Employee Management System is an application used to manage employee data, attendance, payroll, recap personnel data, and so on.

title: MCU (Medical Check Up)
description: The MCU (Medical Check Up) system is an application used to manage data on patients, doctors, examination results, and so on.

title: Sistem Assasment Pegawai PT. Dua Benua
description: PT. Dua Benua Employee Assessment System is an application used to assess employee performance, provide recommendations for promotions, and so on.

title: E-Mountaineering
description: E-Mountaineering is an application used to manage mountain climbing data, provide information about mountains, and so on.

title: LENS (Lecturer Evaluation System)
description: LENS (Lecturer Evaluation System) is an application used to evaluate lecturer performance, provide recommendations for promotion, and so on.
